testsuite.name: megastores.Forgot_Username
testsuite.system-out: Existing Username: Login clicked successfully Existing Username: Forgot Password Link clicked successfully Existing Username: Forgot Username Link clicked successfully Test Passed : Username successfully sent to email id.

Non-Existing Username: Login clicked successfully Non-Existing Username: Forgot Password Link clicked successfully Non-Existing Username: Forgot Username Link clicked successfully Test Passed: Non-Existing Username: Giving User Not found message if the email id does not exist

Empty Email: Login clicked successfully Empty email: Forgot Password Link clicked successfully Empty email: Forgot Username Link clicked successfully Test Passed: Empty email: Displaying message as Email is required and will not Send

Invalid Email: Login clicked successfully Invalid email: Forgot Password Link clicked successfully Invalid email: Forgot Username Link clicked successfully Test Passed: Invalid email: Empty email: Displaying message please enter a valid email address.
